scene_description_enriched: A winged figure, likely an angel, is depicted kneeling on a green grassy ground. The figure wears a flowing white garment adorned with gold patterns. Its wings are spread, showing a vibrant combination of blue and red. The background is a decorative tapestry or wall hanging, featuring a grid pattern with alternating gold squares and squares containing red circles or blue circles. The figure holds a circular object, possibly a censer or a musical instrument, in its right hand.
